columns.source_u_id: The unique identifier of the user initiating the trust.
columns.target_u_id: The unique identifier of the user receiving the trust.
columns.trust: The trust level between users, ranging from 1 to 10.

trust.table_description: The table tracks trust relationships between users.

columns.i_id: The unique identifier for each item in the database.
columns.title: The name or title of the item being reviewed.

item.table_description: The table stores information about items available for review.

columns.a_id: The unique identifier for each review entry in the database.
columns.u_id: The unique identifier of the user who submitted the review.
columns.i_id: The unique identifier of the item being reviewed.
columns.rating: The score given to the item, ranging from 5 to 10.
columns.rank: The rank of the review, indicating its position among others.

review.table_description: The table records user reviews for items with ratings and ranks.

columns.u_id: The unique identifier for each user account.
columns.name: The name of the user associated with the account.

useracct.table_description: The table stores information about user accounts.
